name: Crack the Egg?
description:
"What's that??" "An egg! A big one too! I'm giving this to you, 
see if you can crack this one up."

Welcome to Crack the Egg?, an egg clicker where you click on the egg to crack it open.

How to play:

Use left mouse click to interact
